column4: i think i tried to run unity 2d with compiz because now i have no titlebars on windows and no taskbar. any way to reset unity to default ?
modify it ? no, how could i modify it. thanks nyvenZA
I did the same thing, what i did was delete the config files from my home direcotry to fix it
I deleted the .gnome2, gconf, and gconfd file lol it fixed it for me
